connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch

to associate (cognitively)/to make an associative connection/mental association/word prediction and auto-complete functions of input method editing programs
lit. to join hands/to act together
Associated Press (AP)/abbr. for 美國聯合通訊社|美国联合通讯社[Mei3 guo2 Lian2 he2 Tong1 xun4 she4]
Soviet Union, 1922-1991/abbr. for Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) 蘇維埃社會主義共和國聯盟|苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟[Su1 wei2 ai1 She4 hui4 zhu3 yi4 Gong4 he2 guo2 Lian2 meng2]

sentences.english: The so-called security zone is in the buffer zone between South and North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 所謂的聯安全地帶，也就是在南北韓之間的緩衝地帶。

sentences.english: The change of anticardiolipin antibody was determined by enzyme linked immunoabsorbent assay (ELISA).
sentences.chinese: 抗心磷脂抗體採用酶聯免疫吸附法測定。

sentences.english: Liverpool are set to outbid West Ham United for Lazio midfielder Valon Behrami.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦在對貝赫拉米的出價上擊敗了西漢姆聯。

sentences.english: Represents a symbol binder for unmanaged code.
sentences.chinese: 表示非託管代碼的符號聯編程序。

sentences.english: Some of the smaller traders are being frozen out by big combines.
sentences.chinese: 一些小間人正受到一些大的聯公司的排擠。

sentences.english: United Micro Electronics laid off several hundred employees.
sentences.chinese: 聯電解僱了數百名職員。

sentences.english: In this paper, the join of two trees with a regular monoid is explicitly described.
sentences.chinese: 明確給出了具有正則自同態幺半羣的兩個樹的聯。

sentences.english: CRP released into the medium was measured with ELISA.
sentences.chinese: 釋放到介質中的CRP用酶聯免疫吸附法測定。

sentences.english: Neoshow Media understands you may have unique targeting in mind for your product or service.
sentences.chinese: 新秀聯理解您的產品或服務可能會擁有獨特的定位。

sentences.english: So the question is, what is a Phison?
sentences.chinese: 所以，問題是，什麼是羣聯？

sentences.english: Conditioned media was analyzed with enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay.
sentences.chinese: 符合條件的進行酶聯免疫吸附試驗。

sentences.english: The final item concerns the performance of WHO at all levels.
sentences.chinese: 最後一個項目涉及聯世衛組織在各個層面的績效。

sentences.english: Atrial wave in precordial leads had not any change.
sentences.chinese: 胸前導聯心房波無明顯變化。

sentences.english: The average optical density (OD) and inhibition rate were counted by Universal Microplate Spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 通過酶聯免疫檢測儀計算平均吸光度值和抑制率。

sentences.english: Antibody to nuclear of egg was detected by ELISA coated with yolk.
sentences.chinese: 以雞卵核爲抗原建立了酶聯免疫法，檢驗相應抗體。

sentences.english: Welcome to those who need UMC business negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎有需要者聯電洽談業務。

definition: to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
